text: "Attention" is a song by Nigerian singer and songwriter Omah Lay and Canadian singer Justin Bieber. It was released on March 4, 2022. The song serves as the second single to Lay's first studio album, Boy Alone. The song failed to chart on the Billboard Hot 100. Instead, it debuted at number 11 on the Bubbling Hot 100. ==References== Category:2022 songs Category:Justin Bieber songs
title: Attention (Omah Lay and Justin Bieber song)
